title: Tuesdays & Fridays
short_cast: Anmol Thakeria Dhillon, Jhataleka, Niki Walia, Kamini Khanna, Zoa Morani, Nayan Shukla, Eklavyey Kashyap, Reem Shaikh
cast: Anmol Thakeria Dhillon, Jhataleka, Niki Walia, Kamini Khanna, Zoa Morani, Nayan Shukla, Eklavyey Kashyap, Reem Shaikh
genre: Romantic Comedies, Hindi-Language Movies, Bollywood Movies, Comedies, Dramas, Romantic Movies

desc: To avoid the burden of commitment, a young lawyer and a writer agree to be romantic partners only two days a week. That won’t get complicated — right?
